name: Vampire
description: Your proof of immortality. You invested your whole life on a countless battles with immensive power, and all your experiences has paid off until now. The living nightmare of the old world, is now a scavenger of the Cataclysm.

name: Marked of the Vampire
description: NPCs will check your progress with this trait.
